ComicInfo.Summary:
Featuring the debut of new writer Kate Leth (ADVENTURE TIME: SEEING RED), the Bravest Warriors know how to save the universe and they know how to save it good! But what happens when it's the universe's time to save them? It's going to be a crazy mission but maybe the universe is up to it, and if not, then hopefully Catbug will come up with something. Right?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Mike Bear | 1 | B | Cover B | Sibylline Meynet | 2 | C | Cover C | Claire Sullivan | 3 |
